dc_title_s: Mich. School Furniture Co's new map of Michigan; prepared by Henry S. Stebbins.; Michigan School Furniture Company's new map of Michigan
dc_description_s: Washington and Greenwich prime meridians. Includes table of cities and towns with a population over 1,000. Includes advertisement for the "new fearless desk of the School Furniture co.". Inset: Isle Royale. 1 map: mounted on cloth, 45 x 44 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Stebbins, Henry S.,Michigan School Furniture Company.
